backend/main.mo: Defines core social-network data types and initializes maps for posts, profiles, friendships, requests, notifications, and storage with authorization mixins.
feature_evidence.json: Empty feature evidence report with no listed features.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing key frontend components and pages for routing, profiles, feed, requests, and UI elements.
frontend/DEPLOYMENT.md: Deployment instructions outlining prerequisites and build steps for publishing the app.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining light/dark theme variables and base styles.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Configures TanStack Router routes wrapped in AppShell and AuthGate for feed, profiles, directory, requests, notifications, and settings.
frontend/src/components/AppHeader.tsx: Header component with authenticated navigation, unread notifications badge, and mobile drawer menu.
frontend/src/components/AppShell.tsx: Page layout wrapper providing header, main content container, and footer.
frontend/src/components/AuthGate.tsx: Blocks access to protected pages and displays a sign‑in prompt when unauthenticated.
frontend/src/components/FriendActions.ts: Renders friend‑related action buttons based on relationship status with error handling and mutation hooks.
frontend/src/components/FriendRequestCar: Renders a friend request card showing user info and actions to accept, decline, or cancel requests with loading states.
frontend/src/components/FriendsList.tsx: Displays a list of a user's friends, loading profiles and enabling navigation to each friend's profile.
frontend/src/components/ImagePicker.tsx: Provides image upload with validation, preview, progress tracking, and removal support, returning an ExternalBlob.
frontend/src/components/LoginButton.tsx: Displays a sign-in/out button using Internet Identity with handling for login state and session clearing.
frontend/src/components/PostComments.tsx: Shows collapsible post comments, allows adding and deleting comments, and loads commenter profiles.
frontend/src/components/PostComposer.tsx: Form for creating a post with text and optional image, using ImagePicker and createPost mutation.
frontend/src/components/PostEditDialog.t: Dialog for editing an existing post’s content and media with validation and update handling.
frontend/src/components/PostList.tsx: Renders a list of posts with author info, media, reactions, comments, and pin handling for profile mode.
frontend/src/components/PostOwnerActions: Provides owner-only post controls including edit, delete, and optional pin/unpin with dialogs and mutation hooks.
frontend/src/components/PostReactions.ts: Displays reaction count and lets authenticated users toggle a heart reaction using backend mutation hooks.
frontend/src/components/ProfileEditor.ts: Form for editing user profile details, images, and saving updates via mutation hook.
frontend/src/components/ProfileFollowBut: Renders follow/unfollow button for another user with loading states using follow-related hooks.
frontend/src/components/ProfileImages.ts: Shows cover and avatar images with fallbacks and size variants for user profiles.
frontend/src/components/UserCard.tsx: User directory card displaying profile info with navigation, follow controls, and validity checks.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages the authenticated or anonymous backend actor and invalidates dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useComments.ts: Provides hooks to fetch, add, and delete comments with query invalidation for updates.
frontend/src/hooks/useDiscoverSignals.ts: Offers fire-and-forget functions to record search and profile view signals without impacting UI.
frontend/src/hooks/useFollow.ts: Provides hooks for checking follow status, following/unfollowing users, and retrieving the list of followed principals via react-query.
frontend/src/hooks/useFollowStats.ts: Fetches follow statistics for a given user with default placeholder values on error.
frontend/src/hooks/useFriends.ts: Implements hooks to fetch friends, check friendship status, and manage friend request actions using react-query.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Defines context and provider for Internet Identity authentication, exposing identity state and login/logout methods.
frontend/src/hooks/useNotifications.ts: Contains hooks to fetch, count, and mark notifications as read for the current user.
frontend/src/hooks/usePosts.ts: Provides hooks to fetch user posts and perform create, update, delete, and pin post mutations.
frontend/src/hooks/useProfiles.ts: Supplies hooks for fetching and saving user profiles, including the caller’s profile.
frontend/src/hooks/useReactions.ts: Offers hooks to fetch post reactions and toggle the caller’s reaction.
frontend/src/hooks/useSettings.ts: Includes hooks to fetch and save user settings, invalidating related profile data on updates.
frontend/src/hooks/useTimeline.ts: Fetches the caller’s timeline posts from the backend.
frontend/src/hooks/useUserSearch.ts: Searches user profiles based on trimmed search text using react-query.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining light and dark theme variables and global styles.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Entry point that initializes React, wraps the app with QueryClient and InternetIdentity providers, and loads global styles.
frontend/src/pages/FeedPage.tsx: Displays the feed with post composer and post list, redirecting unauthenticated users to the home page.
frontend/src/pages/FriendRequestsPage.ts: Shows incoming and outgoing friend requests with tabs and loading states.
frontend/src/pages/LandingPage.tsx: Landing page prompting login and highlighting app features, redirecting authenticated users to the feed.
frontend/src/pages/MyProfilePage.tsx: Renders the current user’s profile, posts, and follow stats, including profile setup and editing flows.
frontend/src/pages/NotificationsPage.tsx: Lists user notifications with per-item and bulk mark-as-read actions.
frontend/src/pages/SettingsPage.tsx: Allows users to update and save their display name in profile settings.
frontend/src/pages/UserDirectoryPage.tsx: Provides user search and discovery with loading, error handling, and following indicators.
frontend/src/pages/UserProfilePage.tsx: React page that loads and displays a user's profile, posts, and follow/friendship status, handling invalid IDs and redirects for own profile.
frontend/src/utils/formatDate.ts: Utility that formats bigint nanosecond timestamps into readable dates using date-fns.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Helpers for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters, supporting both query and hash routing with sessionStorage fallback.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining themes, colors, animations, plugins, and content paths.
project_state.json: Metadata file describing project state, versions, and an in-progress feature request for deployment.
